author: blizzardthewolf
install_msg: Thank you for installing my cog, if you run into any issues or have any questions, you can find me in the Red servers or DM me @blizzthewolf. You are also free to open an issue on [my repository](https://git.purplepanda.cc/blizz/blizz-cogs). **Please note that using this cog may break Youtube's Terms of Service. The cog creator is not responsible for any problems this might cause. You also may need to install ffmpeg to your system if you get any errors.**
name: YTDownloader
short: Convert youtube video's to MP3 or MP4
description: Convert youtube videos to either MP3 or MP4 using this cog!
